subject: Replace technical jargon with plain language across all UI tabs
body:
StyleTab:
- Typography → Fonts
- Overlay → Color Tint, Enable Overlay → Enable Color Tint
- Opacity → Transparency
- Global Padding → Overall Spacing, Custom padding → Custom spacing
- Frame % → Border %, % of padding as border → % of spacing used as border

MediaTab:
- Image Overlay → Image Color Tint
- Overlay → Color Tint
- Opacity → Transparency

TemplatesTab:
- Aspect Ratio → Shape
- "Looks apply overlay" → "Looks apply color tints"

ContentTab:
- "Supports **markdown** formatting" → "Supports **bold** and *italic* formatting"
- Freeform placeholder: "Write text or **markdown**..." → "Write text here... use **bold** or *italic*"

https://claude.ai/code/session_013hywBGVNYi6RR3sQcDG3b7
title: Replace technical jargon with plain language across all UI tabs
